name: Saucony Kinvara 12 Shoes - Youths
description: Pint sized runners for kids who like to move. These lightweight shoes are are breathable and cushioned, keeping little active feet happy throughout playtime.Synthetic and mesh upper provides a comfy fit.Recycled polyester lining with an antimicrobial treatment keep them fresh.Memory foam footbed and EVA midsole for cushion and comfort.Rubber lugs grip to trail or pavement.
